name: POV Ass Grab
description:
This is a LoRA for POV Ass Grab.

I suggest using this LoRA at 0.6-1.0 weight for best results.

  • Use CLIP SKIP 2.

  • This was trained on NAI. NAI-based models will give the best results.

  • Tested on AOM2 (Worked), AOM3 A1 (Worked), 7th Anime (Worked), Pastel Mix (Worked), My Own Mix (Worked), Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix (Worked), Chillout Mix (Kinda Worked), Dreamshaper (Doesn't Work).

  • Always add this to the prompt with the LoRA to activate it properly: povag, pov hands, ass grab

  • Add the tags: pussy, spread pussy to spread her pussy.

  • Add the tags: lying, on stomach - To make her lay down.

  • Add the tag: from below to grab her ass from below.

  • Just adding pussy, anus gives slightly different results.

  • Try other other descriptive tags - It might give you interesting results.

Known Issues

  • If it has issues with character LoRAs, try lowering the character's weight - This is how I fixed it.

  • If it's changing the style too much - Just lower the weight of the Ass Grab LoRA to 0.6-0.7 to fix it. It's slightly overbaked.

  • If you don't describe anything (hairstyle, hair color, clothing) and only have base tags - It will only generate her ass and nothing else sometimes.

  • Sometimes her ass will fuse with panties or clothing when using pussy, anus, or spread pussy tags. You can add bottomless or cameltoe to fix this.

  • Anus, Spread Anus - doesn't work too well compared to Pussy, Spread Pussy tags.

  • If you have issues with the eyes - Upscale or add looking back, looking at viewer to help the AI generate them better.

  • This is only V1 - It will have it's issues but will be updated in the future with V2.

Embeds and LoRAs used

Bad Prompt - Ekune Style LoRA

Follow me on Twitter for updates- https://twitter.com/TrueHeroBang

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
